p: After casting a spell, Sylas stores a charge of Petricite Burst.  Sylas's basic attacks will expend a charge and whirl his energized chains around him dealing bonus magic damage to enemies hit. While Sylas has a charge of Petricite Burst, he gains attack speed.
q: Sylas lashes his chains out, intersecting at his targeted location dealing damage to and slowing enemies.   After a delay, magical energy explodes from the intersection point dealing damage.
w: Sylas lunges at an enemy with magical force dealing execute based damage and healing himself against enemy champions.
e: Sylas dashes to a location. Sylas can recast the ability to throw his chains out, pulling himself to an enemy he hits.
r: Sylas steals the enemy's ultimate ability and can cast it freely.
